name: Construction Cancellation Order
description:
I hope you know how to play text adventures, because this doesn't have a tutorial. Made with punyinform.

The world is kind of needlessly detailed, so make sure to examine stuff. Please let me know if you get confused, can't get the game to do what you want, or have a weird transcript.

I ended up not being able to work on it as much as I expected, so it's only the intro. Despite it being a like month long jam I only really got to work on it for a couple of days. I will hopefully keep working on it soon.
